summary: Build a React web app (MediaAI) for AI media creation: image generation with prompt enhancement, image editing with AI suggestions, a video slideshow builder, and voice-over script generation/preview UI.
architectural_notes: Use Google Generative Language API (Gemini) for text tasks with exponential backoff retry logic.
Use Imagen model endpoint for text-to-image generation; store returned images as base64 data URLs in client state.
Use Gemini image generation/edit endpoint by sending inline base64 image + edit prompt and reading image data from response parts.

existing_features.title: Implement the MediaAI application shell with a collapsible left sidebar and a top header whose title changes based on the active tab (Image Maker, Video Studio, Voice Over), matching the structure and user-facing labels shown in the provided React snippet.

Build the Image Maker tab UI with: (1) a text prompt input, (2) an "Enhance" action, (3) a "Create" action, and (4) a responsive image gallery grid that displays generated images and supports selecting an image to open a full-screen preview/editor.

Implement the full-screen Image Preview & AI Editor panel for a selected image, including: selected image display, edit prompt textarea, "Get Edit Suggestions" action that renders up to 3 suggestion chips, one-click insertion of a suggestion into the edit prompt, and an "Apply AI Changes" action that adds the edited result back into the gallery and updates the selected image.

Implement the Voice Over tab UI with: topic input, "Generate Script" action, script textarea (editable), voice selection dropdown with the listed options, and a "Preview Audio" button (UI-only; no real TTS integration).

Implement the Video Studio tab UI as a presentational screen matching the provided snippet (icon, title, description, "Add Photos" and "Generate Video" buttons), without attempting actual video generation.

Replace all direct calls to external Google Generative Language / Imagen endpoints with local stub implementations that simulate responses for: prompt enhancement, voice script generation, edit suggestions, image generation, and image editing; the UI must still behave as if requests are occurring (loading states, results rendering). Preserve the system/user prompt strings in code for future wiring, but do not perform network requests to these endpoints.

Apply a coherent, consistent visual theme across the app based on the provided dark, cinematic UI direction (slate/near-black surfaces with electric accent colors), ensuring spacing, typography, borders, and hover/focus states are consistent across tabs and modals.

new_feature_requests.summary: Image Maker tab: generate images from text prompts (Imagen) and show results gallery with selectable preview
AI Prompt Enhancer: expand user prompt into a detailed cinematic image prompt via Gemini
Full-screen image preview & AI Editor: edit a selected image using text instructions (Gemini image) and add edited result back to gallery
Cinematic edit suggestions: fetch 3 short AI editing suggestions for a selected image and allow one-click insert into edit prompt
Video Studio tab: UI to select/add generated photos and generate a cinematic slideshow video with transitions
Voice Over tab: AI script writer (30-second script) and voice selection + preview audio UI
App shell: sidebar navigation (collapsible) and header content that changes per active tab
